alert.note: Alert for Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:16PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Judith Basin, west central Fergus, southeastern Chouteau and east central Cascade Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Belt to 11 miles northeast of Geyser to 6 miles southeast of Denton. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geraldine, Denton, Highwood, Shonkin, Coffee Creek and Square Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
